whiteboard.title: $t(common.Whiteboard)
whiteboard.onlyRealTimeEditorAvailable: To edit this $t(common.whiteboard) now, please use the $t(common.whiteboard) editor closing this dialog and opening the $t(common.whiteboard) directly clicking on the preview.

memo.title: $t(common.Memo)
memo.tooltip: Add a collaborative document to this $t(common.post)

link.title: Call To Action
link.tooltip: Add a call to action to this $t(common.post)

contributionTypes.title: $t(common.Collection)

settings.title: $t(common.Collection) $t(common.settings)
settings.commentsOnEachResponse: Enable $t(common.comments) on each Post in the $t(common.collection)

confirmBackDialog.title: Are you sure that you want to go back?
confirmBackDialog.text: There are unsaved changes in this form, is you close this dialog changes will be lost.

settings.label: Directly Start
settings.description: Add your first links below, after publishing new links can be directly added to the $t(common.post).

settings.label: Default text:
settings.explanation: Add default text to the $t(common.posts), for example, questions that you like people to answer.

contributionTypes.tooltipDisabled: Please create a new $t(common.post) if you want a different $t(common.collection) option.

confirmOverwrite.title: Overwrite current input?
confirmOverwrite.content: If you import a $t(common.template), your current input could be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?

notification.label: Notify the $t(common.community).
notification.description: $t(common.Members) of this $t(common.community) will receive a $t(common.notification) if enabled in their $t(common.notification) $t(common.settings).

create.disabledSubmitTooltip: Please make sure all titles are filled in.

accessForbidden.title: Content not available
accessForbidden.description: We apologize, but the content you requested is not available. It may have been deleted, or you may not have the permission to access it, such as if it was put in draft mode.

callout.closed: This Callout is closed. You can still comment on the individual Posts.
callout.notMember: You can't reply to this discussion since you're not a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.space)
callout.delete-confirm-text: All $t(common.posts), $t(common.whiteboards) and messages under the Callout will also be deleted.
callout.permission-help-text: Use the switch below to close this callout for new entries.
callout.alkemio-link: Click here to read more about Alkemio's collaboration tools

link-collection.delete-link: Click here to delete this link
link-collection.save-to-add: Click ‘Save as draft’ or ‘Publish’ to start adding links.
link-collection.no-links-yet: There are no links yet, be the first to add one!
link-collection.delete-confirm: Are you sure that you want to remove this link from {{title}}?
link-collection.cancel-confirm: If you leave this dialog, your new links will not be saved.
link-collection.more-links: {{count}} links, click here to show all

dashboard-discussions-section.title: Debates ({{count}})
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-create: No hay debates disponibles. Crea un nuevo debate
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-join: No discussions available. Please join the $t(common.community) to create a discussion

type.title: $t(common.post) label
type.help-text: What type of information do you want to share?

postLocation.title: $t(common.post) location
postLocation.label: Contributing to Callout
postLocation.reminder: Be careful changing the $t(common.posts) location. Moving the $t(common.post) to another Callout will make it disappear from the current Callout. This might make it difficult for people, including the person who created this $t(common.post), to retrieve it. Note that you can only move $t(common.posts) within the same $t(common.space) or $t(common.subspace).
postLocation.success: Successfully moved $t(common.post) to the new Callout.
postLocation.error: Something went wrong when moving the $t(common.post), please try again.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this $t(common.post)?

closeConfirm.title: Discard $t(common.post)
closeConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to close this $t(common.post)? Unsaved changes will be lost.
